00039 #include "os/ThreadInterface.hpp"
00040 #include "os/threads.hpp"
00041 #include "os/fosi_internal_interface.hpp"
00042 
00043 using namespace RTT::os;
00044 
00045 ThreadInterface::ThreadInterface()
00046 {
00047     threadnb = threads.read();
00048     threads.inc();
00049 }
00050 
00051 ThreadInterface::~ThreadInterface()
00052 {
00053     // we can not decrement, if a thread is
00054     // destroyed, the number becomes unused.
00055     //threads.dec();
00056 }
00057 
00058 bool ThreadInterface::isSelf() const
00059 {
00060     return rtos_task_is_self( this->getTask() ) == 1;
00061 }
